meanings.definition: Having a lot of flesh; plump or fat.
meanings.sent1: The cat with the fleshiest belly loves to nap in the sun.
meanings.sent2: She chose the fleshiest peach from the fruit stand.
meanings.sent3: The fleshiest squirrel in the park always wins the nut-gathering contest.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were the fleshiest apples in the orchard of faces.
meanings.sent5: The fleshiest steak on the menu practically melted in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: In the competition, she was declared the fleshiest of them all.
meanings.sent2: The fleshiest in the group always gets the most attention.
meanings.sent3: The fleshiest of the candies was the first to disappear from the bowl.
meanings.sent4: His argument was the fleshiest of all the points made during the debate.
meanings.sent5: The fleshiest of the flowers in the garden attracted the most bees.
